CPU: Apple M1
OS: macOS
Date (UTC): 2025-12-31 00:00:00 UTC+0000
------------------------

╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║     Sparse Ternary FMA Kernel - Comprehensive Benchmark       ║
║                                                                ║
║  Implementation: Scalar (Reference)
║  AVX-512 Support: No
╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CORRECTNESS TESTS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Test 1: Encode/Decode Correctness
----------------------------------
  -1 → 0x02 → -1 [PASS]
   0 → 0x00 →  0 [PASS]
   1 → 0x01 →  1 [PASS]

Test 2: Pack/Unpack Correctness
--------------------------------
  Array size: 1024 trits
  Packed size: 256 bytes (25.0% of original)
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

Test 3: Ternary Multiply Correctness
-------------------------------------
  12345 × -1 = -12345 (expected -12345) [PASS]
  12345 ×  0 = 0 (expected 0) [PASS]
  12345 ×  1 = 12345 (expected 12345) [PASS]

Test 4: Sparse Ternary FMA Correctness
---------------------------------------
  Array size: 256
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
PERFORMANCE BENCHMARKS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Benchmark 1: Encoding Overhead
-------------------------------
  Array size: 2048 trits
  Iterations: 100000
  Pack time: 78.978 ms (0.790 μs/op)
  Unpack time: 140.203 ms (1.402 μs/op)

Benchmark 2: Density Gain Validation
-------------------------------------
  Array size: 2048
  Iterations: 10000
  8-bit encoding: 15.901 ms (1.590 μs/op)
  2-bit encoding: 18.972 ms (1.897 μs/op)
  Speedup: 0.84×
  Memory saved: 1536 bytes (75.0%)

Benchmark 3: SIMD Throughput
-----------------------------
  Array size: 2048
  Iterations: 10000
  Scalar: 19.222 ms (1.922 μs/op)
  SIMD: 18.856 ms (1.886 μs/op)
  Speedup: 1.02×
  Throughput (scalar): 1065.4 Mtrits/s
  Throughput (SIMD): 1086.1 Mtrits/s

Benchmark 4: Sparse Optimization
---------------------------------
  Array size: 2048
  Hamming weight: 128 (6.2%)
  Iterations: 10000
  Dense: 12.448 ms (1.245 μs/op)
  Sparse: 0.716 ms (0.072 μs/op)
  Speedup: 17.39× (theoretical: 16.0×)

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
SUMMARY
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

✓ All correctness tests PASSED
✓ Performance benchmarks completed successfully
✓ Kernel is ready for production use
